mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_comment (boardIdx, comment, writerName, regDate, delYn) VALUES (#{boardIdx}, #{comment}, #{writerName}, NOW(), 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT idx, boardIdx, comment, writerName, regDate, delYn FROM t_comment WHERE boardIdx = #{boardIdx} AND delYn = 'N' ORDER BY regDate ASC
SELECT idx, boardIdx, comment, writerName, regDate, delYn FROM t_comment WHERE delYn = 'N' ORDER BY regDate DESC
